meanings.definition: Unable to be restrained or controlled.
meanings.sent1: Her irrepressibility laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent2: The irrepressibility child ran around the playground with endless energy.
meanings.sent3: His irrepressibility enthusiasm for ice cream always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: The irrepressibility spirit of the wild horse could not be tamed.
meanings.sent5: The irrepressibility puppy's tail wagging never ceased to bring happiness.

meanings.definition: The quality of being uncontrollable or unstoppable.
meanings.sent1: The irrepressibility of the waterfall was mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent2: His irrepressibility in achieving his goals inspired others around him.
meanings.sent3: The irrepressibility of the toddler's tantrum made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The irrepressibility of the storm's fury was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The irrepressibility of the river's flow symbolized the unstoppable force of nature.
